topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e29666368720974800200#post_555e29666368720974800200
What bigoted views, may i ask? The mod author's view that white people are more attractive? That's hadly bigoted, just a preference.

Keep in mind, it's just modifying their own, individual copy of the game according to their personal preferences. Hardly something to get all worked up over.


"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e287b63687209747b0100#post_555e287b63687209747b0100
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]Logic dictates they -are either really fucking stupid or a bigot- find white people more attractive.[/bq]

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e29226368723d6d1a0700#post_555e29226368723d6d1a0700
Look there is no point in this, your not going to change your mind, the same way you do nothing but bitch About Movie Bob while telling everyone else to get over it, just because you like to ignore the real world and pretend that you aren't part of a greater whole doesn't make that true, end of story, you aren't ruining this day for me so we are done with this,
